law.text:
If an individual was convicted of a violent crime and the victim made a written request for notification under § 7-801(b)(1)(ii) of this subtitle or if the victim or the victim's representative filed a notification request form under § 11-104 of the Criminal Procedure Article, the Department shall notify the victim or the victim's representative:
that a warrant or subpoena was issued by the Commission for the individual's alleged violation of a condition of parole;
that the individual has been found guilty or not guilty of violating a condition of parole; and
of the punishment imposed on the individual for violating a condition of parole.
